Reviews.Title: Finally found my camera
Reviews.Author: Margaret Noble
Reviews.Content: I grew up with an Olympus OM-1 as my go-to SLR film camera.  When it came to the point where I wanted to get a digital SLR, I kept looking but not buying.  Asked myself what I really wanted, and the answer was, my old Olympus, only digital!  So I researched and found this camera.  There's a newer version out now, but I am more than happy with this one, which you can use as if it's your old manual camera, or operate on any of a number of automatic and cool, artistic settings.  There's another review in the line-up that really goes into detail about all the tech specs and specific features, so search for that, but my review is A-plus.
